root.mailContent:
Dear <%firstName%><%lastName%>,

We are here to notify that <%userId%> has been Modified as super Bank Admin



Please find attached reference copy. Please use this document for any further communication.
Kindly note that the attachments are password protected. To open the attachment, kindly enter your 6 / 8 digit Customer ID. This e-mail is for your information and does not require a response.



If you wish to contact us for any further clarifications, please e-mail us at xxxx or call XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX within UAE or XXXXXXXXXXXXX from outside UAE.



Sincerely,
Bank Admin Department
www.OA-ADMIN.com
